alert.note: Alert for Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Monroe County through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms producing heavy rain over central Monroe County, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding possible in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, East Rochester, Fairport, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Henrietta, Penfield, Spencerport, Scottsville, Pittsford, Strong Memorial Hospital, North Chili, Martin, Rochester International Airport, Rochester General Hospital and Garbutt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 near exit 12. Interstate 90 near exit 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
